channel.title: New to coding
channel.description: Well I just started learn rsps's how search bar isn't helping in my situation. Where do I change the ip in client and source.

item.title: New to coding
item.dc:creator: @okya okya
item.description:
@okya wrote:

Im 317 PI source. Thanks i’ll try what you guys said.

Read full topic

item.title: New to coding
item.dc:creator: @mrcrispypwn mrcrispypwn
item.description:
@mrcrispypwn wrote:

They are both partially right. In a 317, you change the ip in both the server AND the client. In server files client.java search for: “server =” without the quotes and look for an ip adress. Change that to your hosting ip. For the client, there is different methods, but the one that I know is go into gui.java and scroll down a bit and look for an ip. Change that to yours, save both and compile both.
EDIT: since I helped you please help me http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,482120.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: New to coding
item.dc:creator: @war_of_godzz war of godzz
item.description:
@war_of_godzz wrote:

client.java search
server= and change the ip to 127.0.0.1 or your ip adress
i forgot about gui.java lol

Read full topic

item.title: New to coding
item.dc:creator: @bedhead_321 bedhead 321
item.description:
@bedhead_321 wrote:

You dont change the Ip in a source it should be in client.Java or Gui.Java depending on your client on all PI sources its client.java search the word “server” with find and change the ip when you find something along the lines of

Sever= “127.0.0.1”

Read full topic
